column4: Linux is for dumb mentally retarded bitches who ate too many lead chips as babies. Ubuntu is gay care bear cotton candy pansy ass insecure bloated faggotry compared to the spartan NetBSD and OpenBSD
life must be rough when you're part of the forgotten
uh, OpenBSD does not want to be a popular OS we just want to be the best at what we do. We also do not care about newbies like Ubuntu we expect OpenBSD users to be advanced users
sounds like you have a luddite sausage fest, all 3 members of your community
OpenBSD developers know exactly who our target audience is ourselves the elite and not the benighted masses
Ubuntu panders to the benighted masses the newbies
yeah being on the cutting edge of security technology sure is luddite </sarcasm>
thou hast protest too much -- I think you're trying to convince yourself more than anyone else that you're elite.
I'm just having fun trolling. You are putting too much meaning into my presence here
I'll let you live in your little 1990s dream world though

yeah the 1990s when linux was still exclusively for geeks and still had a relatively knowledgeable userbase unlike now where Linux is for bitches and dumbe ones at that and Ubuntu is the primary cotton candy pansy ass Bitch distro
there are two kinds of camps : the userfriendly camp e.g. Ubuntu and Windows where security is a joke and the security camp i.e. OpenBSD which generally shuns usability
your over compensation is too obvious
I guess since there is no women around for you to blame your inadequacies on, you have to resort to blaming linux these days LOL
don't you have a small innocent animal to torment like a normal sociopath?
don't you have more time to waste on parasitic illiterate newbies who refuse to seriously research their problems first before asking like the retarded fool you are ?
great to know you set the bar high on accomplishments in life
I'm sure most of the people in here have you on /ignore by now, but I don't because you're quite entertaining
I guess only the macho he-men run BSD :P
yeah BSD users do kind of remind me of catholic priests
and you're a millionaire too right?  Just like every other person on irc.
because everyone on irc is a millionaire womanizing badass
